name: muffled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A muffled sound is quiet or not clear: I could hear muffled voices next door but couldn't make out any words. The muffled roar of traffic could be heard in the distance.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
making little or no noisequietThere was a quiet tapping at the door.silentThe stadium fell silent after the goal was scored.soft"Come here!" he said in a soft voice.muffledI could hear muffled voices from the next room.faintThere was the faint sound of traffic in the distance.
